TEXT: The current amount of Diamonds is shown above the energy interface. NL NL You can have up to #b10 #yDiamonds. NL NL The passive and active amounts are displayed at the top of the diamond.
Hover the cursor over the #yDiamond to see more information.

TEXT: #ySummoner can summon a #pDemon at the start of battle. NL NL The #pDemon will attack with the #ySummoner in different ways.
Demon's attack damage is shown here. NL NL #yOriginal #ySin will Increase this damage.
Holding the Left Mouse button will #ySacrifice the #pDemon. NL NL And #ySummoner will gain a different power from the #pDemon.
#pSoul #pStone is a kind of unique resource of the #ySummoner. NL NL It can be used to play #ySoul #yStone cards. NL NL You can have up to #b3 #pSoul #pStones. Obtain #b1 at the start of each combat,
